optionTooltip.inventive_inventory.ignore: Choose to ignore or include locked slots.
optionTooltip.inventive_inventory.sortin:
Specify the sorting rule.
Name is alphabetical and
Item Type contextual.

Sort Cursor Stack: The stack in your cursor will be sorted.

Keep Cursor Stack: The stack in your cursor will be kept.

AOK-Dependent: When pressing the Advanced Operation Key the stack in your cursor will be kept.

AOK-Dependent Inverted: When pressing the Advanced Operation Key the stack in your cursor will be sorted.
optionTooltip.inventive_inventory.automa:
Automatic: Stack will get refilled automatically.

Semi-Automatic: Stack will only get refilled when pressing the Advanced Operation Key.

Keep Tool: Before your tool breaks it will be replaced.

Break Tool: Your tool will be replaced after it broke.

Material: The tool with the best material will get refilled

Health: The tool with the least durability will get refilled.
optionTooltip.inventive_inventory.profil: If activated you only have to press the profile key to load your profile.
